entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use Improvements in CMake Generator Expressions to Simplify our Build System's ones #93370
    9.0.0
  • Is it possible to get an Avalonia app published into the Apple iOS App Store? #93366
  • R2R Build perf: consider parallelizing `RunReadyToRunCompiler` in `_CreateR2RImages` #93364
  • ilverify error messages should better support nested types #93361
  • [ARM][.NET 7] - System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException on ThreadPool ctor #93356
  • Incorrect value in FirstDayOfWeek test #93354
  • Timeout on CurrentCulture_BasedOnLangEnvVar #93353
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf runs broken with `Generic Type Definition failed to init, due to: Inline array struct must have a single field. assembly:System.Private.Xml.dll type:<>y__InlineArray2`1 member:(null)` #93348
  • [wasm] JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes - System.ObjectDisposedException #93347
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Exponential blowup in VNForMapSelectWork #93342
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8.0 RC1 and RC2 lag spikes #93341
  • HttpClientHandler with PreAuthenticate enabled can't refresh expired password #93340
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ISpanScannable, IUtf8SpanScannable #93339
  • Configuration Binding source generator throws InvalidOperationException at runtime for type with custom [TypeConverter] use within a dictionary #93335
    9.0.0
  • superpmi-replay/superpmi-diffs fail with "No space left on device" #93332
  • Repo tag for v7.0.12 is for v7.0.11 #93328
  • Support PublishAot for Linux Docker on Windows with Docker Desktop natively #93327
  • Error with running or building on 7.0.401/2 #93325
  • System.IO.File.OpenRead - incorrect and misleading exception #93324
    Future
  • ThreadStartException in System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests on WASM #93323
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrashMainThread/ParallelCrashMainThread.sh #93321

Closed

  • [mono][perf] WASM disk size regression on 15 Nov 2022 #79598
    9.0.0
  • [browser] V8 System.Text.Json.Tests AOT assert - loader.c:1821, condition not met #89670
    9.0.0
  • [AOT][Blazor][Net8] Performance issue in async code #89733
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT compilation issue on IOS ARM64 - losing interface members? #92106
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent behavior between TimeProvider in .NET 8 and .NET 6 during testing #92264
    8.0.0
  • Jitted Methods Counting Test Fails When Hardware Intrinsics are Disabled #93261
    9.0.0
  • Configuration source generator should use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull if it's available #89879
    9.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89936
    9.0.0
  • [gcstress] LoadVector128x2SByte fails under gcstress #93230
    9.0.0
  • SSL_CERT_DIR should support multiple paths #91110
    9.0.0
  • XML Test/Validation for handling of w3.org redirect changes #74382
    Future
  • ReflectionTypeLoadException when interface is loaded from different locations #93013
  • Load X509Certificate2 with CreateFromPemFile #93319
  • Failures in SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3 test #74896
    9.0.0
  • Allow to allocate known eternal objects (especially buffers) #4369
    Future
  • Got Win32Exception when I send an HTTPS request #91464
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties.Index should be uint #93316
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/StructMarshalling/ReversePInvoke/MarshalSeqStruct/ReversePInvoke/ReversePInvokeTest/ReversePInvokeTest.sh #93166
    9.0.0
  • Enhance the retry after of System.Threading.RateLimiting #77991
    Future
  • Documenting .NET 8.0 APIs #88561
    8.0.0
  • Too many duplicate xxx.runtimeconfig.json #91238
    Future
  • blazor publish build fails #93279
  • JIT: Make JIT time constants from calls to Type methods and properties #4920
    Future
  • Unable to build dotnet/runtime source code locally with dot net framework 4.6.2 as target framework #91316
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: defer creating throw helper blocks until simple lower #93371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vector512 Support for Enumerable<int>.Min/Max #93369
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove `BBF_TRY_BEG` #93367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • wasm runtime tests debug #93365
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Fix CMD_OBJECT_REF_GET_VALUES_BY_FIELD_TOKEN behavior #93363
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Revert "Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions (#92029)" #93362
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [PERF] Update hybridglobalization case conversion to be POSIX Standard #93360
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Update workload description to include target framework #93359
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [PERF] Remove --experimental-wasm-eh argument from used wasm_args #93357
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #93355
    needs-area-label
  • Fix broken ECMA link #93351
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove duplicate semicolon in CSharpSyntaxUtilities.cs #93350
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Skip non virtual generic methods in build_imt_slots #93349
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Improve SpanHelpers.ClearWithReferences for arm64 #93346
    area-System.Memory
  • Use BigMul for 32x32=64 in decimal #93345
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix exponential blowup of memory dependency arrays in VNForMapSelectWork #93344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [docs][wasm] Merge duplicated wasm build instructions. #93343
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Report Exception.FullName for `http.client.request.duration/error.type` #93322
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix `MEASURE_MEM_ALLOC` build in Release #93358
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [8.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92986
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [6.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92988
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92987
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Skip Jitted Methods Counting Test when DOTNET_EnableHWIntrinsic=0 #93264
    test-bug, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 118.0.5993.70, windows: 118.0.5993.70 #93352
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Arm64: Implement LoadAndInsertScalar APIs #93197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix the test template for LoadVectorx* #93301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder #93115
    area-System.Reflection
  • [MT][browser] Disable new CI failures on library MT tests #93224
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #92920
    area-System.Security, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Enable DotNETRuntimePrivate provider #93245
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Clean up some ifdefs in EventSource #93287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Change Active Issue Number #93333
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix dropping NaN sign and payload when importing float constants #93285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Add wasmbrowser template startup measurements #93334
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.IndexOfXx corner-case when first element is seed value #93169
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Rename JitDisablePgo to JitDisablePGO #93320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some issues for CoreRoot test cases: #93187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix emitOutputLJ trying to encode large displacements #93312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use collection expression in foreach in CreateManifestAndDescriptors #93289
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Consolidate a few exception throws in TensorPrimitives #93168
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Remove a few unnecessary `unsafe` keyword uses in TensorPrimitives #93219
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Updated

  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make atomics `GenTreeIndir`-derived #93295
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge CoreMangLib, Exceptions and Interop folders #91901
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Change a few more uses of `new T[]` with a span to collection expressions #93292
    needs-area-label
  • Improve a vector implementation to support alignment and non-temporal tores #93296
    area-System.Numerics
  • [browser] streamline Task/Promise marshalling #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Cleaned up TlsSecret and added test. #93119
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Speed up calling interface methods #93100
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [android][ios] Fix dispose problem with NativeHttpHandlers (#93262) #93291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve disk full test #92682
    area-System.IO
  • Adjust the DNS lookup duration metric #93254
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Does dotnet/runtimelab want to host WIT code gen issues #2409
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Wasi tracking #2269

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [macOS M1] dotnet publish using win-x64 runtime causes System.IO.FileLoadException when executable runs on Windows #36023
  • `--sdk-version` option in `dotnet workload install` command is not working in dotnet 8 rc2, but it was working in rc1 and before #36018
  • 8.0.100-rc.1 dotnet tool update fails #36015
  • [NET 8.0 - RC2] Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\.....\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23480.2.nupkg ......... #36000
  • Give guidance on how to publish custom files on `dotnet publish` #35998

Closed

  • `dotnet tool restore` throws `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` #34347
    8.0.2xx
  • dotnet tool init #23561
    Backlog
  • Dotnet tool restores the wrong version for prerelease packages #35999
  • `BaseImageNotFoundException` when trying to build a container with `-r linux-musl-x64` starting with `8.0.0-rc2` #36022
  • “dotnet-osx-x64.latest.pkg” can’t be opened because it is from an unidentified developer. #7735
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: ProjectReference not transitive during "Pack" on multi-targeted project #35567

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a test for given unlisted tool specified version it can be installed #36021
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35907
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.1xx
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #35980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    Servicing-consider, Area-WebSDK
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #35914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #35913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0
  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544

PullRequests

Created

  • Add docs template for spec issues #7593

Updated

  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution #7591
  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failure in semantic model on `foreach` with custom enumerator of pointer type #70340
  • Generic field access is improperly spilled in some scenarios #70339
    Backlog
  • `MetadataDecoder.GetCustomAttribute` referenced only from `PENamedTypeSymbol.DecodeAttributeUsageInfo` should be removed #70338
    17.9
  • Completion on LSP experiment #70332

Closed

  • `Inline temporary variable` fixer on a reference-type `var` regresses nullability #69859
  • StackoverflowException when compiling VB.NET project #70007
    17.8
  • Xml comments on classes generated by source generators are not included in the .xml file build output #70249
    17.9
  • Visual Studio C# text editor indentation for "else switch" #70314
  • Cannot build deeply nested hierarchies with .NET 8 RC 1 SDK (e.g. Microsoft.AspNetCore.Odata) #70272

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove recursion in part of Find-References algorithm #70348
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add extra validation for Compilations having the expected trees #70347
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing
  • WIP: More checksum work (cont3) #70346
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rewrite captured field symbol during "materialization" #70344
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: More checksum work (cont2) #70343
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: More checksum work (cont1) #70342
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: More checksum work. #70341
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Validation build 5 #70336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Validation build 1 #70335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Perform source gen out of proc (sync all) #70334
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Perform source gen out of proc (sync project cone) #70333
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pass along analyzer references to projects #70331
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix .NET 8 RC1 version #70345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix regression that caused us to sync data unnecessarily. #70320
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid cycle caused by calculation of ObsoleteState/ExperimentalState. #70171
    Area-Compilers, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, 17.8

Updated

  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesized list types should implement ICollection and IList #70288
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Fix build race #70261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution #70328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support to the LSIF generator for document symbols #70304
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Warn if collection expression to ref struct type incurs a heap allocation #70264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • In most cases, remove the camel case matching for case sensitive matches #70324
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial implementation of sub-heading spans (for sticky scroll) #69915
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow switch arms to start a line with an open brace #70014
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • File types need to account for pathmap #70322
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Eliminate Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Http2.MaxConnectionFlowControlQueueSize #51309
  • Use configuration for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Http2.MaxEnhanceYourCalmCount #51308
  • Leaking tasks when aborting HTTP/2 Connections #51307
  • Blazor Web App with Identity Razor Components unable to log user out in .NET 8 RC2 #51302
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, plaintext #51301
  • Perf improvement: json #51300
  • Multiple connections to _blazor #51299
  • NavLink not working in InteractiveServer #51297
  • Blazor: suspicious CS8601 on nullable delegate/Func/Action component parameters #51296
  • Provide an option to enable enhanced form handling by default #51295
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Signalr Client can't communicate with server after reconnect #51290
  • Identity Endpoints - Lifetime IEmailSender #51289
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo not navigating in specific case (.NET 8 RC2) #51288
    8.0.0
  • False positive: ASP0022: Route '/' conflicts with another handler route (.NET 8 RC2) #51285
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plaintext, updates #51284
  • Perf improvement: single_query #51283
  • The Blazor Web App template in .Net 8 RC2 does not offer equivalent functionality to the previous Blazor hosted WASM template #51281

Closed

  • Error.razor should always be a static server rendered page #51031
    8.0.0
  • Make RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentRenderMode's renderMode parameter nullable #51170
    8.0.0
  • Global option has no effect on the Blazor Web App template when Auth is selected in NET8 RC2. #51274
    8.0.0
  • [.NET 8 RC2] Add DataAnnotiationsValidator to the identity template Login.razor #51277
    8.0.0
  • Applying migrations using db error page fails for Blazor Web App with Identity #51178
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Web App template fails to compile when selecting Auto, Global #50980
    8.0.0
  • ObjectDisposedException on HTTP/2 connection abort #51310
  • .NET 8 RC1 Blazor build suddenly errors. Required parameter 'renderMode' of ... #51293
  • Remove the top level Components folder from the Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App template #51167
    8.0.0
  • Remove temporary APIs before .NET 8 ships #50225
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 RC1 Blazor Web App Deployed to IIS Can't Find Resources #51027
  • Request to customize the http request header sent by HttpClient created in Blazor #51247
  • MapIdentityApi throws a System.ArgumentException when a user has multiple roles #50037
    8.0.0
  • Opaque redirect handler results in message "Error: 405 Method Not Allowed" in Blazor app #51118
    8.0.0
  • Android java client - RuntimeException: Invocation provides 1 argument(s) but target expects 0. #51189
  • add HelpUriLinks for generator errors #48184
    8.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Skip failing template tests on Win11-arm64 #51311
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Fix-up] Track indicators of excessive stream resets #51306
    area-networking
  • Add Overload for AddRateLimiter() Without Options Parameter #51298
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware

Merged

  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Track indicators of excessive stream resets #51304
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Track indicators of excessive stream resets #51303
    area-infrastructure, area-networking, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51145
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove temporary APIs now Razor compiler is updated #51252
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Remove MapIdentityApi's InfoResponse.Claims property #51177
    Servicing-approved, area-identity, 8.0.0
  • [Blazor] Emit action attribute when not explicit. #51130
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Update fabricbot.json #51282
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Change HealthCheckPublisherHostedService exception log from debug to error #51120
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution
  • Dispose secret instances #51253
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • SignOutHttpResult/SignOutResult ctor overloads that take a single authentication scheme #51220
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix handling of default values in RDG #51193
    area-minimal
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use token expiration value from options as fallback #51113
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • [release/8.0] Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51276
    feature-rdg, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When initializing SOS, `coreclr_initialize` sometimes fails with HR `0x80131022`, leading to "Unrecognized command" error for managed commands #4315
  • !clrstack reports incorrect method names when <> is encountered #4314

PullRequests

Merged

  • Dotnet Counters + Dotnet Monitor Unification #4254
  • Dotnet Counters + Dotnet Monitor Unification - Automated `Collect` Testing #4253
  • fix doc for fq -allReady #4310

Updated

  • Handle log messages with duplicate placeholders and null args #4284

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • vscode error while fetching extensions XHR failed #17962
  • PerformFetch iOS lifecycle delegate lacking an extension method #17960
  • Navigating back from a TabbedPage does not invoked a destructor #17959
    .NET 8 GA
  • Entry not getting focused if we want to set focus at the time when new activity opens #17954
  • [MAUI] D17 page when click on some empty space, the editor 2 is still focused #17953
  • [MAUI] G3 and G7 pages do not have "Page" menu bar on ios, maccatalyst and android #17952
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9373] AmbiguousMatchException thrown for overloaded methods called from xaml event #17950
  • TapGestureRecognizers not working #17948
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Border size changes appear to be animated on iOS/MacCatalyst #15363
    Backlog
  • Restore packages fails with error NU1605 when Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility version is 8.0.0-rc.2.9373 #17951
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] SplashScreen resize=false failed to work on iOS. #17924
  • [MAUI] Recipe splash screen logo missing on iOS #17925
  • Maui Splash Screen will not update on iOS App #17940
  • The current activity cannot be detected #17944

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes iOS Elastic Scrolling #6689 #17963
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Update .NET versions to be the latest public release on nuget.org #17961
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17956
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Only attach log files for current test #17949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Update Blazor Hybrid template to match ASP.NET Core Blazor Web template #17946
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄

Merged

  • Use Cake for running integration tests #17964
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 SR1
  • [net8.0] Update to rtm versions #17904
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #17957
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.7 to 7.3.8 #17958
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net8.0] Reverting default item and globbing updates #17852
    .NET 8 GA
  • Update README.md #17941
    community ✨
  • API Doc improvements to fix online browser warnings #17732
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17947
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Object must implement IConvertible when used strongly typed keys #32030
  • Allow table-sharing for base types in TPC and unmapped base types in TPT #32028
  • Ef Core Query loosing rupee unicode symbol ₹ when trying to do a simple like query on it, instead generating "?" mark #32027
  • Cannot retrieve grouped items #32026
  • Case expressions may only be nested to level 10 when using SplitQuery() or ToList() inside projection. #32023
  • Clearing collection doesn't remove the entities from the database table? #32022
  • Incorrect naming of calculated values in projections #32021
    Backlog
  • UseArtifactsOutput causes dotnet-ef to fail #32020
  • Query: should we add bootstrapping logic to QueryableExtensions.LeftJoin? #32019
  • Accept `Action<SetPropertyCalls>` in `ExecuteUpdate` #32018
  • Support data seeding for JSON columns #32017
    Backlog

Closed

  • Seeding issue with JSON columns in EF Core 7 #29297
    8.0.0
  • Cosmos query projection on owned entity list throws InvalidOperationException variable 'jArray1Object' of type 'Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject' referenced from scope #31974
  • Support translating value objects that are using a converter #31994
  • Remote calls can delay DBContext being disposed? #31957
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite how to open from exists stream #31928
  • Convert.ToString(SomeProp, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) throws when used in a Union #31910
  • Change Tracker GetDatabaseValues #31892
  • Get all is returning entities which has delete state #31875
  • HasConversion<string> from GUID generated migrations contains non existent column called TempId #31860
  • EntityState is set to Unchanged instead of Modified when assigning a new complex nested property - CosmosDB #31846
  • "The convention invocations have reached the recursion limit" after running Remove-Migration #31841
  • EFCore 8 Preview7 - RelationalTypeMapping for a parameter doesn't seem correct while updating Json field #31807
  • Query/JSON: improve exceptions when failing to translate JSON queries #29732
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #29156 - TemporalAll for temporal owned entities mapped to parent table. #32031
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0] Validate that the owner in TPC or TPT is mapped. #32029
  • [release/8.0] Change error to warning for trigger defined on non-base type #32025
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #29297 - Seeding issue with JSON columns in EF Core 7 #32015
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #31961 - Projection filtering on second-level reference could not be translated #31996
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Unwind changes made to temporarily unblock the .net 9 codflow #17453

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17504
  • Start synchronizing `CODEOWNERS` files into the VMR #17503
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #17499

Merged

  • .NET Source-Build 8.0.100-rc.2.23502.2 October 2023 Updates #17498
  • Use .NET 8 version of WebAssembly Sdk Pack when targeting .NET 6/7 #17484
    Area-NetSDK
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #17489
  • .NET Source-Build 6.0.123 October 2023 Updates #17494
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #17491
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #17490
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #17486

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix minimum macOS version in the .pkg manifest #17497
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17496
